data_table.description: Atrial Fibrillation dataset to be used in conjunction with 2011 AF Survival dataset, Original, Offspring, NOS, and Generation 3 reviewed through 12/2011. This dataset was generated by examining ECGs from FHS exams as well as hospital and other medical records obtained on FHS participants. All cases were reviewed by a cardiologist or MD. This dataset is to be used with the 2011 AF Survival file (vr_survaf_2011_m_0787s). If you want to use event data without follow-up time, please use the most recent AF file (vr_afcum_2012_m_0772s).
